channel.title: Skills on Gibby Free
channel.description: Recent content in Skills on Gibby Free

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a firm believer in the Internet’s power to serve as a repository of information and expertise, and for various reasons I believe that text is the ideal medium to capture, convey, and archive knowledge effectively. Basically, I write here because I love sharing my learnings with others. Information should be accessible to everyone. Access to free, high-quality educational content in computing enables individuals from all backgrounds to excel in engineering and related fields.
